title: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra hands-on: noteworthy updates
description: Samsung just unveiled their top of the line, all specs included, brand new Galaxy S21 Ultra at Unpacked 2021. The S21 Ultra features the Snapdragon 888 octa-core processor, up to 16GB of RAM, and a 6.8-inch 3200x1440 display with adaptive 120Hz refresh rate. On the back, Samsungs quad-camera system features significant upgrades from last year's Galaxy S20 Ultra in a much improved design. Preorders for the Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra will begin today, January 14th with a starting price of $1,199.
